game.name: Cats Hidden in Italy
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이탈리아 곳곳에 숨겨진 고양이 100마리를 찾아보세요! 이 귀엽고 손으로 그린 숨은그림찾기 게임은 원조 바이럴 ‘숨은 고양이’ 게임의 창작자 Travellin Cats가 만들었습니다! 전부 찾을 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden across Italy in this hand-drawn hidden object game by Travellin Cats - the original viral hidden cats game creator! Can you find them all?

reviewHighlights.text: Cats Hidden in Italy is a cozy, minimalist hidden-object game that embraces a simple premise and executes it with charm and clarity. Developed by Trav...
